Package courses

Class Course

  • java.lang.Object
    • courses.Course
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    public class Course
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Course class to add register students, print list of students registered, set coursework components and more.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Course

        public Course​(java.lang.String courseName,
              Professor professor)
        Constructor for Course object. Each course must be assigned a course coordinator (Professor). A course object keeps track of HashMaps of three key objects:
        • sessions: The delivery format for the course (e.g. lecture)
        • components: The components of which students will be graded on
        • students: The students registered under this course
        Parameters:
        courseName - Name of the course
        professor - Course coordinator for the course

    • Method Detail

        Returns:

      • insertSessions

        public void insertSessions​(java.lang.String sessionName)
        This method inserts a session into this course's sessions HashMap.

      • hasVacancies

        public boolean hasVacancies()
        This method checks if the course has vacancies available. A vacancy is available when there is at least one vacancy in every course component. This way, we assume that when a student registers for the course, the student must be registered under every course component. If at least one course component has no vacancies, the entire course will not have vacancies.
        Returns:
        true if course has vacancies; false otherwise.

      • printVacanciesForSession

        public void printVacanciesForSession​(java.lang.String sessionName)
        This method prints a list of vacancies of groups across a specified session.
        Parameters:
        sessionName - Name of the session to print group vacancies from

      • printStudentListForSessionGroup

        public void printStudentListForSessionGroup​(java.lang.String sessionName,
                                            int groupId)
        This method prints a list of students for a specified session and group.
        Parameters:
        sessionName - Name of the session to print student list from
        groupId - ID of the group in the specified session to print student list from

      • addStudentToCourse

        public void addStudentToCourse​(Student student)
        This method adds a student to the course.
        Parameters:
        student - Student object to be added to the course

      • clearComponents

        This method resets the HashMap components for this course.

        This method sets the weightage of a specified component in this course.
